verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H1732><s%> Judge <S%H8199><s%> me, O LORD; <S%H3068><s%> for I have walked <S%H1980><s%> in my integrity: <S%H8537><s%> I have trusted <S%H982><s%> also in the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> therefore I shall not slide. <S%H4571><s%>
Examine <S%H974><s%> me, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and prove <S%H5254><s%> me; try <S%H6884><s%> my reins <S%H3629><s%> and my heart. <S%H3820><s%>
For your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> is before <S%H5048><s%> my eyes: <S%H5869><s%> and I have walked <S%H1980><s%> in your truth. <S%H571><s%>
I have not sat <S%H3427><s%> with vain <S%H7723><s%> persons, <S%H4962><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> will I go <S%H935><s%> in with dissemblers. <S%H5956><s%>
I have hated <S%H8130><s%> the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of evil doers; <S%H4827><s%> and will not sit <S%H3427><s%> with the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
I will wash <S%H7364><s%> my hands <S%H3709><s%> in innocence: <S%H5356><s%> so will I compass <S%H5437><s%> your altar, <S%H4196><s%> O LORD: <S%H3068><s%>
That I may publish <S%H8085><s%> with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of thanksgiving, <S%H8426><s%> and tell <S%H5608><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> your wondrous <S%H6381><s%> works.
LORD, <S%H3068><s%> I have loved <S%H157><s%> the habitation <S%H4583><s%> of your house, <S%H1004><s%> and the place <S%H4725><s%> where your honor <S%H3519><s%> dwells. <S%H4908><s%>
Gather <S%H622><s%> not my soul <S%H5315><s%> with sinners, <S%H2400><s%> nor my life <S%H2416><s%> with bloody <S%H1818><s%> men: <S%H582><s%>
In whose <S%H834><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> is mischief, <S%H2154><s%> and their right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of bribes. <S%H7810><s%>
But as for me, I will walk <S%H3212><s%> in my integrity: <S%H8537><s%> redeem <S%H6299><s%> me, and be merciful <S%H2603><s%> to me.
My foot <S%H7272><s%> stands <S%H5975><s%> in an even <S%H4334><s%> place: in the congregations <S%H4721><s%> will I bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
